articles.title: Joe Mazzulla repeated the same two words for an entire press conference after Celtics’ loss
articles.description:
Mazzulla was clearly unhappy with the officiating at the end of Boston's loss to the Pacers.

articles.title: 4 things to know about Patriots divisional-round playoff foe Texans
articles.description:
Drake Maye and the Patriots’ offense will have their hands full against a dynamic Texans defense that can generate plenty of pressure.

articles.title: Patriots to play Houston Texans in AFC divisional round
articles.description:
The Patriots will host Houston at Gillette Stadium on Sunday, with kick-off set for 3 p.m.

articles.title: Pascal Siakam and Pacers nip Celtics 98-96 for 1st 3-game win streak of season
articles.description:
Boston's Derrick White missed a go-ahead 3-point attempt in the final seconds. He had tied the game at 96-all on a driving layup with 28.6 seconds remaining.

The post Pascal Siakam and Pacers nip Celtics 98-96 for 1st 3-game win streak of season appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Finally given NHL shot, Bruins’ Jonathan Aspirot has been difference-maker on defense
articles.description:

articles.title: Anfernee Jennings made the most of his biggest opportunity of the season against the Chargers
articles.description:
Jennings tied his season-high for snaps with 39 and delivered a sack on third down late in the fourth quarter.

articles.title: Celtics reportedly showing trade interest in Mavericks big man
articles.description:

articles.title: What Craig Breslow said about Red Sox losing Alex Bregman sweepstakes to Cubs
articles.description:

articles.title: Jaylen Brown fined $35,000 by NBA after ripping officials following loss to Spurs
articles.description:
"I don’t care, they can fine me whatever they want but it’s crazy. Every time we play a good team it’s the same [expletive].”

The post Jaylen Brown fined $35,000 by NBA after ripping officials following loss to Spurs appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Patriots coach Mike Vrabel reveals star cornerback Christian Gonzalez is in concussion protocol
articles.description:
"How long that lasts, I don’t know, but when you don’t return to the game, when they won’t let you go back in the game, that would put him in the protocol."

The post Patriots coach Mike Vrabel reveals star cornerback Christian Gonzalez is in concussion protocol appeared first on Boston.com.
